content: X-ECH/FR U Flame-retardant cable holder with nail Flame-retardant cable bundle holder with pre-mounted, ultimate-performance nail for fastening cables to tough concrete using powder-actuated tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Quick, cost-efficient fastening of cable bunches Convenient fastening on ceilings using the pole tool extension system Virtually dust-free solution for fastening overhead Material property inhibits the spread of fire and toxic fumes Stop function for controlled fastener driving Applications Fastening bunched electrical cables on concrete Securing bunched electrical cables to ceiling and walls For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Cable Fastenings Material: Polyamide (PA), Halogen-free, Flame-retardant according to EN 60695-2-11 at 960°C, Flame-retardant according to IEC 60695-2-11 at 960°C, Flame-retardant according to VDE 0471 part 2-11 at 960°C, Flame-retardant according to UL 94 (HB), Flame-retardant according to UL 94 (V-0), UV-resistant (fair) For use with (tools): DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Cable Fastenings | Material | Polyamide (PA), Halogen-free, Flame-retardant | For use with (tools) | DX 2, DX 351, DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid clay brick), Masonry (solid limestone brick) | Approvals | CSTB, UL | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 386238 - Plastic cable holder X-ECH/FR-S U37 - Package Size 100 pc - 386239 - Plastic cable holder X-ECH/FR-M U37 - Package Size 100 pc - 386240 - Plastic cable holder X-ECH/FR-L U37 - Package Size 50 pc
